=============================
Lasco - a web picture gallery
=============================

**Lasco** is a web picture gallery written in Python with `Pyramid`_.
Yes, this is yet another image gallery. But this one is mine and comes
with the right color scheme.

.. _Pyramid: http://pylonsproject.org/
